language.entry: Werewolf
Bloodshed Claws
Bloodshed Claws
Horrendous Roar
Horrendous Roar
Taunt
Taunt
Smoke Bomb
Smoke Bomb
Savage Feast
Savage Feast
Headbutt
Headbutt
Regain Humanity
Regain Humanity
Move
Power
Fading Power {colour_start|stun}"Albeit so faint, something stirs within."{colour_end}
Creeping Power {colour_start|stun}"A little fever has never felt so... invigorating."{colour_end}
Growing Power {colour_start|stun}"Hunger and tremors are minor side effects which can be resolved with proper exercises."{colour_end}
Unstable Power {colour_start|stun}"A bad outcome to some, a blissful release to others."{colour_end}
"Gévaudan's Nightmare" {colour_start|stun}"The beast returns prideful as ever."{colour_end}
Cape
Stained Corset and Tattered Cape {colour_start|stun}"They reek of memories of the lassy's downfall and of those she's taken."{colour_end}
Washed Corset and Patched Cape {colour_start|stun}"The outfit of a decent, battle-scarred rogue."{colour_end}
Restored Corset and Renewed Cape {colour_start|stun}"Just like the time she bought them."{colour_end}
Adapted Corset and Modified Cloak {colour_start|stun}"A special set fitting for any occasion... and phases of the moon."{colour_end}
"The Red Omen" {colour_start|stun}"An augur of trouble even for the bravest. She knows how to make an entrance."{colour_end}

{colour_start|stress}Werewolf's {colour_end}{colour_start|riposte}Riposte{colour_end}{colour_start|stress} is a weaker version of {colour_end}{colour_start|notable}Bloodshed Claws{colour_end}{colour_start|stress}, so it has similar effects and scaling.{colour_end}
A rogue of the wild and an alluring predator, the Werewolf puts her skills to good use for gold and the rush of the hunt. She strikes the front line and taunts her foes, as retaliation is her main strategy. If enemies don't fall by her claws, they'll fall by the intense bleeding of their wounds and if she can't reach that pesky back liner, her intimidating roar can make them panic, forcing them out of formation.

Different from her abominable peers, she's embraced her beastly condition and enjoys the growth of her power with each kill. This Werewolf, actually a Beast Shifter, wears a cloak to mask her human identity and a corset that once hid a pair of blades, but now only serves to attract unsuspecting prey.

Some would call her a selfish creature, but the Werewolf is willing to share her tricks and secrets with her allies if it raises the chance of a successful expedition. Previously being both hunter and the hunted, survival is her middle name and so she can save herself from the brink of death if... a companion is wiling to lend a hand.
Beauty is the Beast
Found wandering by the Old Road, this lady claims to be here to help. Her eyes, however, gleam for something more than gold.
ENCOURAGE
Remember your purpose to be here in the first place, and FIGHT!
Be it the glint of gold, a holy purpose or the path to redemption, perseverance is your ally.
What doesn't kill us, makes us stronger.
BANDAGE
Stand still while I lick the wound. I'm serious.
This is a skill we all need to improve survival. Now, don't move.
The one thing I'm not good at is taking out bullets... ok I might be able to do it with my claws but...
HOBBY
Oh, yes. I carve things in my spare time...
The shape of your face in contrast with the flame... May I sketch a portrait?
I'm not good at assembling mechanical things, but I like dismantling them and seeing how they work.
BITE THE HAND
You'll be thanking me later (snicker).
Consider yourself worthy of my choosing. A blessing or a curse, only time will tell~.
ON THE PROWL
The secret is to lay low and kill them before they even move.
Survival lies in the art of ending what hasn't even started.
BEAST WITHIN
One to rule them all.
We're One and the Same!
GATHER INGREDIENTS
Voilá! The recipe is stolen but who cares, I am a lady of many talents!
The concoction is ready. It's more useful than laudanum if you ask me.
{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} 2 pts/rd for 3 rds
Attempt to craft the Cleansing Elixir
Cleansing Elixir
Use to remove stuns from your party. {colour_start|notable}[Can be brought to Hamlet]{colour_end}
Change to mode: Beast / Activates {colour_start|riposte}Riposte{colour_end} (60%% chance)
Transform to Beast (30%% chance)
No Food Consumed or Required When Hit: +15%% DMG if in mode Beast
{colour_start|healhp}Heal{colour_end} HP for %d%% of DMG Done Catch {colour_start|disease}Rabies{colour_end} {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(3%% per target){colour_end}
%d%% ACC/DMG/CRT
Inedible
Clear {colour_start|mark}Mark{colour_end} / Clear {colour_start|stress}Horror{colour_end}
On Battle End: {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} -5 if in rank 2/3/4
GRAAAGGHHH!
Snrrff.
HWRAWRRRRR!
ERRRRAAAAAGHHH!
GWERRRRRRGGHHH!
SHKA-TULURRGHH!
Rrrolf.
IA! IARRRGH!!!
FRRAAAGGNNNN!
EEEEERRROARRRGGH!
AARRARRRGGGH!
SKREEEEE!
GOLD AND GORE AWAIT ME.
(LAUGHTER)
AHH... THE SCENT OF FEAR
GRR AHWWROOOOOOOO!
WHAT GOOD TIMING FOR A SNACK!
I TALK TOO MUCH? TELL ME HOW BIG MY MOUTH IS. EH HEH HEH.
CUTE... LET ME SHOW YOU WHAT A REAL WOLF IS MADE OF.
I. AM. THE APPEX PREDATOR.
WHO'S AFRAID OF THE BIG BAD WOLF?
HEY, HOW ABOUT PICK A FIGHT WITH SOMEONE YOUR SIZE? AHAH.
OUT. OF. OUR. WAY!
The little bookworm is unnerved by my presence...
...staggering force!
...auggh!
...can't stand my ground!
Can't...hold ...balance!
What terrible strength!
The force of devilry!
Whoa oohh... overdid it a little.
Damn, I didn't expect that.
Oof... no no I'm fine.
(panting)
(grunt)
UGH! Sturdy fiend...
Ehe heh yeah... I caught that...
Big mistake there, friend.
NO... I am... I refuse to believe.
Sending me in would be a very unwise decision.
Ferocious
Rageful
(chuckle) You've brought this on yourself.
Oohh, you're going to regret this.
Be ready to witness my true potential!
Grr! I'll rip you all to SHREDS!
I long for blood and blood I. SHALL. HAVE.
Oh is that a fly on your shoulder?(snicker)
Maybe this will help you stay focused.
... be. More. USEFUL!
(bites)
CONCENTRATE!
My heart races, my bones shift and snap under my breath!
AAAHHHHRRRGGHH!
I should just... AGH NO! MY FULL FORM SHOULDN'T BE REVEALED!
I'll tear their limbs apart!
Haha, ohh the thrill of the hunt!
Hey! Stop babbling, I need some peace and quiet!
Every stitch is an offering.
HUSH everyone! I have a headache.
I won't be the guard dog for tonight. If we're ambushed that's all on you lot.
Nothing else will strengthen me more than their guts in my claws.
I've had too many for today.
... It's overcooked.
I am too mad right now to concentrate.
You better stay away from me for now if you know what's best for you.
I know how to take care of myself.
There's nothing you can do to improve me, little lamb.
NO! WE STAY AND FINISH THIS!
RUN AWAY LIKE A BUNCH OF MICE? WHO DO YOU THINK I AM?
Your abilities are subpar to my natural healing!
My wounds need no cute magic.
I don't need that!
That thing is useless to me right now!
Don't even talk to me! You'll spoil my focus.
Nuh-uh dear, this is MY spot.
That's a nice spot for an ambush!
I'll strike them from there!
(bumps ally when moving)
Leave the real hunter to her own thing.
Stand back, this one is mine.
Allow me to steal the spotlight for a bit.
I'll have my cut of the day!
Don't dare complain.
Where do you think you're going?
Can't do anything from your position? You should train more then.
A skilled hunter strikes from every position!
PERISH!
My rage knows no bounds!
(snarl)
Oh what the hell?
Is this a sign?
Ugh COME ON!
SLIPPERY BASTARD!
The rush of combat feeds my will.
I am not sure how this works, but I like it.
Your weapons won't save you from ME!
Rage... makes me... stronger.
Try me. I am feeling... quite confident today. More than usual
Come here, I promise I won't bite.
Try me, I DARE YOU.
Come on, give me reason to BITE YOUR ARM OFF!
This is how we do it!
I'll show you how it's done.
(chuckle) Beasts do it better.
I'm better off without your orders, chérie.
You CANNOT tame me!
The gold might be yours, but the rules are MINE!
We've come this far, give yourself more credit.
Hey, I might seem like a frothing beast sometimes, but my teeth are meant to someone else.
They're shaken, be aggressive and we'll win!
I know the smell of defeat. It's coming from their side.
If we can bleed them... or blight them, we can kill them!
Taking a walk on the wild side~.
One such as you won't stay in my way.
(whisper) Oh I'll have my revenge alright.
I am fine... I SAID I WAS FINE!
SEND ME OUT TO KILL THINGS! AGAIN!
Please make sure to put me with competent folks.
The task is done, now WHERE'S MY GOLD?
NO, MY BLOOD ALLOWS ME TO-
YOU HAVEN'T SEEN TRUE FURY YET, I AM THE-
What is this? What in the world is this??
My instincts are telling me to flee and they have NEVER been wrong.
This is different! This is, this is different!
But of course I've been set up! AGAIN!
Ahh I see it now... the conspiracy unfurls!
Maybe I'll get extra praise for bringing your treacherous heads!
Turning against the Beast is the most foolish plan I've ever seen.
Injury marks my rebirth!
In blood I am reborn once again!
The beast is pleased with your offering!
Of course I'd be paired with a bunch of idiots!
GAH, the stupidity of you lot shall be our demise!
SILENCE ALL OF YOU USELESS SHEEP!
Hmpf! I'll be claiming more of our share for obvious reasons!
My talents shall NOT be taken down to the same wavelength of you lot's.
I'll make sure to receive what I'm owed this time!
Remind yourselves your hearts are still beating thanks to ME!
It's useless...
Greed... my downfall.
(singing) Frère Jacques, Frère Jacques. Dormez-vous? Dormez-vous~?...
Have you seen how bright the moon is tonight? It's like... yellow.
Would you give me your hand for a dance?
Some say I am part hyena.
(laughter) What do we say in the face of Death?
What a cute little trick you got there, let me show you mine.(chuckle)
No trembling in your boots now. They're ours!
This is nothing compared to the horrors we've conquered!
No amount of armor will keep them safe from me!
I see! Get ready to strike where I do!
I can feel it!
Behold the power of the Beast Blood!
I'm just getting started.
I WILL get to the end of this!
Why you tremble? The most dangerous here is your ally! (grin)
If darkness clouds your vision, then I'll be your eyes.
Hey you! If you pull yourself together, I'll buy you a round.
Come on, put some effort into it.
Give me your best shot.
Imagine the bonus we'll get for their heads!
No gold nor glory will come without a little sweat!
Trust your instincts.
Close your eyes and resonate with what lies within you.
Let the Primal Rage embrace your hearts.
Savagery, for everyone.
They call it sickness, but I've never felt this healthy.
THIS IS THE PART WHERE YOU PICK A GOD AND PRAY!
We should regroup! Retreat! Reform!
This is WAY above us! It's suicide!
This is... no mere prey.
You backstabbers are just as reliable as that group of brigands with their knit wolfy rags (spit).
You think you got me surrounded? Just you wait...
I was right to conceal my other tricks... you better flee before I unleash the real beast.
Dig your weapon deeper into my flesh, if it permits.
Since those days, my flesh has grown numb. But I trust these fiends will retrieve me the taste of mortality.
If all this fails, I'll head to a freakshow heh heh heh!
To think I'd have to be the backbone of this expedition!
I am a professional... surrounded by amateurs.
From now on I'll be adding an extra fee per body disposed.
I should be getting extra solely for keeping my human intellect in a monster's hide!
I do hold a grudge for ingratitude so you lot better be thanking me later with coin or booze.
We're finished. I know the sight of a losing battle.
Even the Beast has abandoned me. Abandoned us.
(gasp!)They peep on us from other dimensions! Rude!
(singing) ... Sonnez les matines! Sonnez les matines~!...
Men have been known to blame beasts for their crimes. Source: me.
If you insist... be my guest.
Clearly you're better suited for this.
Me? Afraid? (nervous laughter)
ONE MORE STEP and I'll slit your friend's throat!
I'll be using one of your friends as my meat shield. How about that?
You can't deceive the deceiver!
My turn!
I'm next, yes!
A prize to whoever makes me bleed first! And for the longest time!
Yes hello good sirs! How may I help you?
A shiny!
You know that lout who rushes into danger to save the loot? Relatable.
Just a moment, I'm gonna check in the back.
Don't step on the fairy ring! You're gonna ruin their wrestling!
That's a nice spot to place my canvas!
Let me accept my fate.
I never thought I'd have come to do this...
Let me ponder for a bit...
I'll... return shortly.
... move.
Excuse me, Queen of Beasts passing through.
...? Who told you to stay there? Move back!
I'm saving your life, that'll be 4,500, in gold.
I'm planning my next attack, go distract them or something.
Shapeshifting requires preparation and good rest, lest my tendons will snap!
You simple folk wouldn't understand, so just give me some room!
I... I'd rather not.
Don't judge me, I know what I am doing!
HAH HAH, as if!
Try to sound more convincing next time. Just a tip though.
Trying to make me plunge to my demise? Not today, honey.
Now's not the right time! The best hunters are the most patient.
You're in no position to order someone like ME around!
I choose whether to follow orders or not, simple as that.
I've failed as a daughter... and as a monster.
Not in the mood for violence right now.
I need... time.
Wait... this isn't my family's workshop... Hmm...
(checks pockets) ... ?? WHERE ARE MY SCULPTING TOOLS?
Shh, shh! I am revaluing my commission prices!
This is the part I ruin your clunky plan!
Time to be unpredictable.
I am untamable!
A deal: the more blood I draw, more you gotta draw from me. A fair trade!
What are you waiting for? HIT ME!
Come now, my head is still worth a good bounty, no?
I don't need anyone's orders, thank you very much.
Let me decide what's best for MY survival, yes?
Watch and learn you spineless baboons.
At this point I'm only fighting for MY survival.
Just look how good things go doing it my way.
I am the best assassin there is! Watch...
As if this matters...
Whatever.
I should forsake my humanity altogether, but I can't!
You didn't tip the waitress?
(singing) Ding ding dong~! Ding ding dong~!
Hold my absinthe.
This is pathetic... pathetic.
I SHOULD BE THE FRIGHTENING ONE! Not... the frightened.
In the end, I am the scared sheep in wolf's clothing.
Let's play a little game called "Sleeping Traitors Get Eaten First". I'll be the monster!
I can turn this camp into a blood soaked war zone, you know?
My wanted poster might not have "Dead or Alive" in it, but it was published before I became this thing. Beware.
Being deprived of sleep only makes it all better. Get up!
Anyone care to help me on a journey of self-discovery?
I think my pain tolerance is higher when I'm transformed... any takers?
If you want to stay on my good side, then prove yourself useful.
Snoring has been known to awaken the beast.
None of you even know how to pack things properly? Thanks for dooming ourselves.
Hmm... I wonder if I get to keep the full share if I end up the lone survivor... (grin)
I need more food than you, given the need of my constant shifting!
It's been a while since I've had noble meat... one of you smells royalty~ (snicker)
I should have never left home. They loved me and I betrayed them.
I can't go back now. What would they think?
Maybe I'll always be weak.
Are we having rats tonight?
THERE! SOMETHING IN THE SHADOWS! Haha, fooled ya.
Can someone check me for fleas?
Strike me! ME!
No, strike me. I am the bigger threat!
(laughter)
You there, come put an end to my disgraceful life.
This is the punishment for my life of crimes.
(waving to an enemy) Susan, Susan! How's your husband? Breathing, I hope.
(loud sneeze) Augh... Who's smoking? It's bad for my nose!
Call me whatever you want, lads, but I take deep offense in calling me a con-artist.
I'll end you right here, right NOW!
GRRR, YOU! IT WAS YOU!
I'd never forget your scent! Since that day!
Do. Your goddamned. JOB!
I am THIS CLOSE to toss you into the fire.
Know your place, lamb!
Is that wine in your veins?
Your clothes are all rumpled! Let me fix that.
YOU! This Beast blesses you with her fangs!
Ugh it's not the same when self inflicted but I'll have to make do.
Am I the key to my own weaknesses? Only my own claws can hurt me for good?
The Beast Blood blesses this soil!
My power... my healing, where's it?
Please come out. Come out, come OUT!
Is it still in my veins?
FLEAS ALL OVER ME! How come? I bathed today!
Where are my horns? Are they hiding in my head?
I don't wanna have eyes in my brain! They're very very bad!
Ohoho! I must admit, I almost fell for that.
For what? To head right into your planned ambush? I don't think so.
And then I get killed on the way to the hamlet while you all are the "survivors"? Nope.
It's no use, they'll catch up to us.
Either way we're dead. Retreating only makes it more painful.
And passing up this opportunity? NEVER!
NO! I must know how many stabbings I can take before I lose consciousness!
This is just... the best opportunity to unravel the limits of my power, I swear!
No! I can't keep postponing this work, the deadline is around the corner!
ART. TAKES. TIME!
Why would we leave so soon? Cake hasn't even been served yet!
NO! STAY AWAY FROM ME!
This is it, I'll die revealing the farce I am.
I am the predator. I am the predator. I AM THE-!
It shows even in the way they swing!
I caught you smiling! You'll be facing my wrath first!
Blast all of you!
You should bow down to your new Queen!
Fine, I'll have your head first!
What are you sheep waiting for? HEAL ME!
That was good, but I need it harder.
That was sweeter than the pain of my transformations.
That sting right into my spleen... a blessing.
AGH! This is NOT how you tip the artist!
You stepped on my foot! You told me you knew how to dance!
Sorry, no refunds!
Please my legs, don't betray me now.
This cannot continue! I might slip next time!
It's all part of the plan, isn't it?
I see! You're stalling until help arrives, huh?
I could just keep transforming back and forth but I got used to it.
(sigh) I miss the first time I transformed... the pain was more unique.
What kind of shoddy lackeys are these? I am WAITING...
...? Ah, no running in the shop, please!
That wind... seemed familiar.
You're welcome. I was distracting it.
After I've weakened it of course!
Yes, go ahead, steal my kills for all I care.
F I N A L L Y my goodness...
Could have been a better swing though.
Thank you! I was looking for that hue of red!
(humming gleefully)
Oh no no no, you'll dull your tool quicker this way!
If they don't end up killing me, my heart will.
Are you... Are you really trying? Just making sure.
I should... just leave you clowns to DIE!
There it is! The clearest sign!
It's like playing pretend, how adorable! (spit)
I find it funny how a bunch of amateurs was hired to take down a professional.
(face palm)
(deep sigh) Unbelievable...
As always, I have to do everything myself.
The result of brute strength with no technique, pitiful!
My good sirs, please watch your children in the shop.
Mmmhm-hm! A promising brush stroke!
That's not how you sabotage a trap. I'd know! Father used to craft them!
(speechless)
(gasp!)
I am too proud to admit but I have to say this anyway: Please I need you alive.
Wow, that definitely hurt them, huh? Little more than a bruise tomorrow!
I bet your weapons are dull!
I can pretend to be in pain better than that.
That was absolutely ruthless... could you do that to me next?
I think I'm in love.
Blood suits you so well, but do you know whose blood would look better on you?(wink)
Why am I not surprised?
... I am being tested. It's the only explanation to this nonsense.
Like the frightened bunny you are...
That's definitely NOT how you sculpt things.
You broke it! That's it, you owe me 2,500! In gold!
(sigh) I've been considering other job options... wait, what timeline is this?
(heavy breathing)
One more blow and we are done for!
(gasp!)
As if I needed any more proof.
You rats can stop the shoddy theater play and just face me instead.
Let's just get this over with!
If you break it, you pay.
Cease this nonsense and let's get together for tea! Or coffee if you prefer.
Hey! Don't you owe me money?
No spot is safe!
(completely still)...
And give you advantage over me? Forget it.
Oh do I happen to be in a bad spot for you? Too bad.
They like to hit this spot, so I'm staying!
Only if you promise me to strike harder than them.
Of course the weak tries to hide behind the strong.
Parasites all of you!
What lousy tactics are these?
No way, I got the perfect frame right here!
Hey! It's rude to cut line!
You got a cute face but the answer is no, I won't be scammed again.
Aww how convenient to offer the thing I was looking for! LEAVE ME!
I bet that thing is tainted.
Pain is my only remedy!
No! I want it to linger for a good while.
I enjoy the sight of it, a reminder of my own mortality despite my condition.
I'll just waste resources.
Better save them for later...
Mmmhhm mmmh I'm afraid you can't win this bargain.
That looks like a bad treat, yes. Bad, bad treat!
I was told to not accept things from strangers.
I know exactly how your "healing" works. I've done that trick before.
Chérie, naïveté isn't in my vocabulary.
I am in perfect condition, thank you very much.
As if my wounds didn't close fast enough already!
I can only have such a limited time to gaze at the gushing wound.
No! I must watch it. Watch the blood pouring down my skin (chuckle)
Save your ability for someone worthy of them.
Why are you so bent into healing a murderous beast?
This is how it all started! I am the fruit of bad science! Or was it...?
Are you gonna turn me into a mass of tentacles next? All they do is wiggle about!
The murmurs of the sea... are not to be trusted!
And make myself more vulnerable? HAH!
Do you reaaallyy think I'm that gullible? Please.
Nuh-uh, I bet it's going to numb it.
You can yell or chant all you want, I'll only listen if you strike me right here.
Make me eat dirt and I might consider it.
If my own strength fails me, everything else will too.
You shouldn't bet on a sick horse.
No, no... exposure isn't going to feed me.
Stop! I'm trying to listen to the grass.
... (deep in thought)
AHHHHH HAH HAH! Yes!
One step closer to the loot!
(chuckle)
Should have used more armor, chérie.
You weren't very attentive with THAT spot, friend.
Woof~
It whispers of death... an unnatural chill runs down my spine...!
I feel cold claws clutching my heart... but I'll retribute the feeling.
An eerie, heavy air weighs down my lungs...
I can't. Not right now.
I'm unstable. I might... hurt you.
No, I don't trust any of you! You hear me? NONE!
That's ridiculous. Imagine!
I should just kill you all here.
Too busy trying to keep these open.
Mmmhmm mm, my blood has such an unique scent... (long sniff)
I can't hear you over their whispers.
Sorry, I'm on break of my babysitting job.
I have no patience for the ignorant.
What? Do you need me to feed you as well? Get lost!
Only if there's coin involved. And paid upfront.
... And what is in it for me?
Aww too bad. No coin, no service.
I have nothing relevant to offer.
When was the last time I've ever helped this team?
I wish I could see their faces one last time.
Excuse me I got commissioned by the- wait... he's dead. WHO'LL PAY ME NOW?.
Sharpie, sharp sharp. Gotta sharpen my tools
Who knew my head would end up worthier than my art?
Why do you insist on toying with me? I know the truth!
Cease this! I know you're a liar! You reek of it!
Now that depends... does it involve a scalpel and a thick needle?
I'll accept it if you can make me bleed.
HAHA no, I don't need your help.
IF we make it out alive you all will have to thank me with gold and booze, not this.
It seems to me you're improvising everything...
Leave me to my self-loathing.
Your skills are valuable and better fit to someone more... righteous.
Where were you when they snatched me away? Sure I was a bandit BUT- (shrug)
(bark bark bark)
(incoherent mumbling)
I'll be saving room for you and your friends.
Just because I can eat trash doesn't mean I SHOULD.
Poison won't kill me but I sure want to avoid getting my guts on fire.
Starvation builds me up for more carnage and punishment!
I am hoping to trigger a more ravenous thing later on in the day... heh heh heh.
No, thanks. I'm not hungry.
I am actually feeling a bit ill...
We should eat the rich!
(gasp!) I can make something out of these!
(playing with the food)
Ever since that time with the portal... I feel... weird...
I feel like I could endure... anything!
This is something beyond my condition... I like it!
Bring. It. ON!
This wolf grows stronger still.
They'll have to break through this first!
Mere blades and claws won't tear THIS flesh!
My body has returned stronger from that portal...!
Put me in my place, will you? (chuckles)
Hmm, do you really think you can take me down with THAT dull thing?
Hey piggies! The wolf has come to take your house down!
I bring teeth, claws... and smoke bombs!
Look at me! Woops, is that dust in your eyes?
HEY! Yeah, focus on the unarmed woman here! Hehehe!
Cripple them! Hehe, always wanted to say that.
HAHA! Pigs and sheep in wolf's clothing, all of you!
We strike as a pack and they'll fall like a herd!
Ohh, that one is mine. MINE!
Make them regret ever being born!
Have a little taste of my power, dear. You're welcome!
This might help you to finish them off. Do the honors!
I've seen what you can do. You CAN finish this!
We push through, WE. FIGHT. ON!
Come on now, if you're gone, who else is gonna complain about my howling?
Doot doot, losers! Take 'em down!
Time's up, let's do this!
I'll hold your beer, now go get them!
Guess what, losers? WOOF TIME! Fetch- I mean, get 'em, dear.
Let's see hoooooooowwwwlll handle this~
Yess feed my will to end this quick!
You don't understand. This beast refuses to go down.
My wounds heal as fast as my transformations.
Whatever this is, I'll make good use of it. Just like before.
I. AM. UNSTOPPABLE!
Haha, I can go another round!
"Cape Cod girls ain't got no combs; Haul away, haul away!"
"Whiskey-o, Johny-o; Rise her up from down below--!"
"Quand j'etais chez mon père;Petite à la ti ti, la ri ti, tonton lariton-"
"Adieu donc la belle je m'en va; Puisquc mon bâtiment s'en va-"
"'Cause her hair was green as seaweed; Her skin was blue and pale-"
"Fifteen men on a dead man's chest; Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum-!"
